headline: Five Star Leader Resigns in Italy, Deepening Party’s Disarray
abstract: He was once the fresh face of a new political force. Now, his exit could signal yet another government crisis.
lead_paragraph: ROME — When the Five Star Movement took power in Italy in 2018, the party’s boyish and immaculately dressed political leader, Luigi Di Maio, emerged as the reassuring face of a political force transitioning from protest movement to a mature governing party.
